about.title: About this site
about.info: Our database of resources benefits from information collected by these organizations:

devhelp.info: This is an open-source project. You can build a database for your community and join our site or make your own in just 3 steps! No engineering skills needed.
devhelp.step1: Reach out to local government and business associations to gather information.
devhelp.step2: Organize resource information using our spreadsheet template.
devhelp.step3: Email us when you are ready to join the NC site.
devhelp.dupsite: Alternatively, you can duplicate a site for your state.
devhelp.devnote: Developers - find our {0} and {1} on GitHub.

contactus.info: This page is powered by the {0} of {1}. For questions, please contact us via {2}.
